I'm sorry to be dense, Kent, but I wish to confirm that this is a
request form me (or someone) to post TestCases for this feature on
SourceForge?

Kent Beck wrote:
> 
> --- In junit@egroups.com, David Corbin <dcorbin@m...> wrote:
> > The next time someone is making changes to JUnit, could said person
> add
> > clone() implementations to the various implementations of Test?  It
> > would be handy for some thing I'm doing....
> > --
> > David Corbin
> > Mach Turtle Technologies, Inc.
> > http://www.machturtle.com
> > dcorbin@m...
> 
> Test cases, please, posted to sourceforge.
> 
> Kent
